languages.text: Гарантом твердости имперской хватки на горле Простора было ручное божество фон Валанциусов. Истребляя врагов и сомневающихся, Вольный Торговец даровал{mf||а} сектору уверенность в неизбежность воздаяния.

The subjugated deity in House von Valancius's service ensured the Imperium's firm grip on the Expanse's throat. By eradicating enemies and unbelievers, the Rogue Trader bestowed a gift upon the sector — of faith in the certainty of retribution.
languages.original_text: Гарантом твердости имперской хватки на горле Простора было ручное божество фон Валанциусов. Истребляя врагов и сомневающихся, Вольный Торговец даровал{mf||а} сектору уверенность в неизбежность воздаяния.

traits.locale_text: The tamed deity in von Valancius's service ensured that the imperial grip on the Expanse's throat was firm. Eradicating enemies and infidels, Rogue Trader granted the sector belief in the certainty of retribution.

The tamed deity in von Valancius's service ensured that the imperial grip on the Expanse's throat was firm. Eradicating enemies and infidels, Rogue Trader granted the sector belief in the certainty of retribution.

The subjugated deity in von Valancius's service ensured the Imperium's firm grip on the Expanse's throat. Eradicating enemies and infidels, the Rogue Trader made the sector believe in the certainty of retribution.

The subjugated deity in von Valancius's service ensured the Imperium's firm grip on the Expanse's throat. Eradicating enemies and infidels, the Rogue Trader made the sector believe in the certainty of retribution.

The subjugated deity in House von Valancius's service ensured the Imperium's firm grip on the Expanse's throat. By eradicating enemies and unbelievers, the Rogue Trader bestowed a gift upon the sector — of faith in the certainty of retribution.

The subjugated deity in House von Valancius's service ensured the Imperium's firm grip on the Expanse's throat. By eradicating enemies and unbelievers, the Rogue Trader bestowed a gift upon the sector — of faith in the certainty of retribution.

languages.text: 被征服的星神为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝服务，确保了帝国牢牢掌控着科罗努斯扩区的咽喉要地。行商浪人无情地消灭了所有敌人与不虔之人，整个扩区的忠仆都相信审判必将降临。
languages.original_text: The subjugated deity in House von Valancius's service ensured the Imperium's firm grip on the Expanse's throat. By eradicating enemies and unbelievers, the Rogue Trader bestowed a gift upon the sector — of faith in the certainty of retribution.

traits.locale_text: 被征服的星神为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝服务，确保了帝国牢牢掌控着科罗努斯扩区的咽喉要地。行商浪人无情地消灭了所有敌人与叛徒，整个扩区都相信审判必将降临。

languages.text: Die unterworfene Gottheit in Diensten der des Hauses derer von Valancius stellte sicher, dass das Imperium die Ausdehnung fest in seinem Würgegriff hatte. Indem {mf|er Feinde und Ungläubige auslöschte, machte der Freihändler|sie Feinde und Ungläubige auslöschte, machte die Freihändlerin} dem Sektor ein Geschenk — den Glauben an die Unumstößlichkeit der Vergeltung.
languages.original_text: The subjugated deity in House von Valancius's service ensured the Imperium's firm grip on the Expanse's throat. By eradicating enemies and unbelievers, the Rogue Trader bestowed a gift upon the sector — of faith in the certainty of retribution.

traits.locale_text: Die unterworfene Gottheit in Diensten der Dynastie derer von Valancius stellte sicher, dass das Imperium die Ausdehnung fest in seinem Würgegriff hatte. Indem {mf|er Feinde und Ungläubige auslöschte, ließ der Freihändler|sie Feinde und Ungläubige auslöschte, ließ die Freihändlerin} den Sektor an die Gewissheit der Vergeltung glauben.

languages.text: La divinité asservie par la maison von Valancius permit à l'Imperium de raffermir son emprise sur les Étendues. En éradiquant ses ennemis et les infidèles, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} fit clairement comprendre au secteur que tout écart serait immanquablement puni.
languages.original_text: The subjugated deity in House von Valancius's service ensured the Imperium's firm grip on the Expanse's throat. By eradicating enemies and unbelievers, the Rogue Trader bestowed a gift upon the sector — of faith in the certainty of retribution.

traits.locale_text: La divinité asservie par la dynastie von Valancius permit à l'Imperium de raffermir son emprise sur les Étendues. En éradiquant ses ennemis et les infidèles, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} fit comprendre au secteur que tout écart serait immanquablement puni.

languages.text: La deidad subyugada al servicio de la casa von Valancius fue el puño de hierro del Imperium en la Extensión. Al erradicar enemigos e infieles, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente otorgó un gran regalo al sector: la fe absoluta en las represalias.
languages.original_text: The subjugated deity in House von Valancius's service ensured the Imperium's firm grip on the Expanse's throat. By eradicating enemies and unbelievers, the Rogue Trader bestowed a gift upon the sector — of faith in the certainty of retribution.

traits.locale_text: La deidad subyugada al servicio de von Valancius fue el puño de hierro del Imperium en la Extensión. Al erradicar enemigos e infieles, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente convenció al sector de que siempre habría represalias para ellos.

languages.text: フォン・ヴァランシウス家に仕える服従神により、帝国はエクスパンスの首根っこを確実に押さえることができた。敵と不信者を根絶やしにし、自由開拓者はこの星域に確実な報復という形の贈り物を授けた。
languages.original_text: The subjugated deity in House von Valancius's service ensured the Imperium's firm grip on the Expanse's throat. By eradicating enemies and unbelievers, the Rogue Trader bestowed a gift upon the sector — of faith in the certainty of retribution.

traits.locale_text: フォン・ヴァランシウス家に仕える服従神により、帝国はエクスパンスの首根っこを確実に押さえることができた。敵と不信者を根絶やしにし、自由開拓者はこの星域に確実な報復という形の贈り物を授けた。

languages.text: Von Valancius Hanesi'nin hizmetine giren ilahi güç; Enginlik'in boğazının, İmparatorluk'un ellerince sımsıkı kavramasını sağladı. Düşmanlarını ve inançsızları ortadan kaldıran Hür Tacir, sektöre herkesin nihayetinde kurtuluşa ereceği inancını hediye etti.
languages.original_text: The subjugated deity in House von Valancius's service ensured the Imperium's firm grip on the Expanse's throat. By eradicating enemies and unbelievers, the Rogue Trader bestowed a gift upon the sector — of faith in the certainty of retribution.

traits.locale_text: Von Valancius Hanesi'nin hizmetine girmiş olan ilahi güç, Enginlik'in boğazının, İmparatorluk'un sımsıkı ellerince kavramasını garanti altına aldı. Hür Tacir, düşmanlarını ve inançsızları ortadan kaldırarak sektöre bir armağan sunmuş oldu: Herkesin sonunda kurtuluşa ereceğine dair inanç.
